amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow for a program of eligible projects to count as a single project to meet the $100 million threshold of project costs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 31 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to allows for a program of eligible projects to count as a single project to meet the $100,000,000 threshold of project costs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A030) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 248 (Roll no. 591).

action.text: Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Takano to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Takano to the Rules amendment (A001).
